item.title: Iran to seek 'fair and equitable' talks with US, president says
item.description: Iran's president said he had instructed his foreign minister to pursue "fair and equitable" talks with the United States.

item.title: WATCH: Behind the scenes before Westminster's best in show
item.description: ABC News' Danny New tours the 150th Westminster Kennel Club Dog Show, meeting people from around the U.S. and exotic dog breeds that are new to him.

item.title: Comer reconsiders contempt resolutions after Clintons agree to sit for depositions
item.description: Bill and Hillary Clinton have agreed to sit for closed-door depositions in the House Oversight Committee’s Jeffrey Epstein investigation.

item.title: Vatican's 'trial of the century' resumes after prosecutors suffer setbacks on appeal
item.description: The Vatican’s “trial of the century” has resumed with appeals after setbacks for the pope’s prosecutors

item.title: WATCH: Horse lays down some sweet guitar licks
item.description: A rescue horse named Yupia was captured in a sweet video strumming the guitar alongside his owner.
